description: Returns the STS short-term credentials for a given role name that is assigned to the user.

parameters.name: roleName
parameters.description: The friendly name of the role that is assigned to the user.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier for the AWS account that is assigned to the user.

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.description: The token issued by the CreateToken API call. For more information, see CreateToken in the IAM Identity Center OIDC API Reference Guide.

nested_items.name: roleCredentials
nested_items.description: The credentials for the role that is assigned to the user.

nested_items.name: accessKeyId
nested_items.description: The identifier used for the temporary security credentials. For more information, see Using Temporary Security Credentials to Request Access to AWS Resources in the AWS IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: secretAccessKey
nested_items.description: The key that is used to sign the request. For more information, see Using Temporary Security Credentials to Request Access to AWS Resources in the AWS IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: sessionToken
nested_items.description: The token used for temporary credentials. For more information, see Using Temporary Security Credentials to Request Access to AWS Resources in the AWS IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: expiration
nested_items.description: The date on which temporary security credentials expire.
